CustomField.formula: IF( Dunning_Level_Zuora__c <>"0", "Level: " + Dunning_Level_Zuora__c + BR(), "") + IF( ISPICKVAL(Dunning_stop_Zuora__c,"yes"), "Dunning Stop: " + TEXT(Dunning_stop_Zuora__c)+ BR(), "") + IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Dunningstopdate__c)), "Dunning Stop Date: " + TEXT(Dunningstopdate__c)+ BR(), NULL)+ IF( Dunning_Level_Zuora__c > "0", "AR Rating: " + TEXT(Forderungsbewertung__c) ,"")
CustomField.label: Dunning Info Zuora
